commentary.revenue_performance: Consolidated revenue grew by a muted 0.6% in INR terms. Full-year revenue was Rs 12,563 crores (3.6% CC growth). India business declined by 3.4%. International business showed strong growth of 19.3% in constant currency.
commentary.profitability: Operating Profit Margin for the full year reached 19.4%. The Q4 profit after tax recorded a growth of 16.2%. Margins were impacted by high inflation, and 80-90 crores of legal costs were budgeted for FY26, similar to FY25.
commentary.business_outlook: Management's ambition is to achieve a sustainable double-digit CAGR in both top line and bottom line by FY '28. The Board recommended a Final Dividend of Rs 5.25 per share.
commentary.key_challenges: The quarter faced a challenging operating environment with **urban consumption slowdown, high food inflation, and unfavorable season**. The company planned to exit categories like tea, baby diapers, and Vita due to limited right to win and margin dilution.
commentary.strategic_initiatives: The company embarked on a Vision strategy refresh, truncating the cycle from 4 years to 3 years with McKinsey. Key strategies include **premiumization** (serums, conditioners) and aggressively pursuing **M&A opportunities** in Health Care/Wellness Foods.
commentary.market_conditions: Food inflation was around 2 to 2.5%. Rural India's consumption was outperforming urban by 450 basis points.
